definition: guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
variant of 琴[qin2], guqin or zither
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Who cut the strings, so Duanchang impact of the song.
sentences.chinese: 是谁剪断了琴弦，弹着如此断肠的曲。

sentences.english: Dad took the fiddle to the telephone and thumped the strings.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸把小提琴拿到话机旁，重重地拨弄了几下琴弦。

sentences.english: When I hear no violins. you play my every string.
sentences.chinese: 当我听不到小提琴声的时候，你为我拔动每一根琴弦。

sentences.english: And I'm playing my lyre on the golden coast, expecting to meet you there.
sentences.chinese: 我坐在金色的海岸弹起琴弦，等待与你会见。

sentences.english: Try to take off all of the pressure until the string sounds muted.
sentences.chinese: 尽量减小按弦的力度值得琴弦发出哑音。

sentences.english: Friends are like fiddle-strings,they must not be screwed too tight.
sentences.chinese: 朋友有如琴弦，不能上的太紧。

sentences.english: You are a Qingcui string, string that pops up on the melody is love.
sentences.chinese: 您是一根轻脆的琴弦，弦上弹出的旋律是爱。

sentences.english: They're really hard to get. I purchased them years ago in great volume.
sentences.chinese: 这些琴弦很难搞到手，几年前我买了一大批储备起来。

sentences.english: Different timbres and different strings play one and the same soft and sweet serenade.
sentences.chinese: 不同声色，不同琴弦，同拨着一支温馨的小夜曲。

sentences.english: The relaxation of the strings, always could not play time.
sentences.chinese: 松驰的琴弦，永远奏不出时代的强音。

sentences.english: The influence of damper with different pressures and positions on damp vibration of piano string is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了止音毡压力及位置对钢琴琴弦阻尼作用的影响。

sentences.english: When love is only a string that is perhaps the most pure love.
sentences.chinese: 当爱情只剩下一根琴弦，也许那是最纯结的思恋。

sentences.english: He idly plucked the strings of the lute.
sentences.chinese: 他漫不经心地拨弄着鲁特琴的琴弦。

sentences.english: Sometimes there are only strings and digitals with me.
sentences.chinese: 有时陪伴我的只有琴弦和琴键。

sentences.english: Researchers from Delft University of Technology and FOM Foundation (Netherlands) have successfully made and 'tuned' the world's smallest piano wire.
sentences.chinese: 荷兰的研究者做了个世界上最小的“琴弦”。

sentences.english: My untuned strings beg for music in their anguished cry of shame.
sentences.chinese: 偶失调地琴弦在它们羞愧地痛苦呻吟中乞求音乐。

definition: bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
widowed/lit. broken string, cf 琴瑟[qin2 se4] qin and se, two instruments epitomizing marital harmony
to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
(music) note/phonetic component of a Chinese character/phonetic symbol/phonogram
sanxian, large family of 3-stringed plucked musical instruments, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and long neck, used in folk music, opera and Chinese orchestra
